---
title: CellInfo
description: Represents information about a cell in the world.
---




## Attributes

### type

<PyAttribute type="CellType" value="" docString="The type of the cell." />

### location

<PyAttribute type="Location" value="" docString="The coordinates of the cell." />

### move_cost

<PyAttribute type="int" value="" docString="The movement cost to traverse this cell." />

### agents

<PyAttribute type="list[int]" value="" docString="List of agent IDs currently in this cell." />

### layers

<PyAttribute type="list[WorldObject]" value="" docString="Stack of world objects present in the cell, ordered by layer." />

### top_layer

<PyAttribute type="WorldObject | None" value="" docString="Get the top-most layer object of the cell." />


## Methods

### is_killer_cell

<PyFunctionSignature signature="def is_killer_cell() -> bool" />

<PyFunction docString="Check if the cell is a killer cell.

Returns:
    bool: True if the cell type is KILLER_CELL, else False." />
